name: Blood Thrill - Permotio Sanguis
description:
Blood Thrill is an Unreal Engine 4 prototype where we want to recreate an asymmetrical 4 vs 1 experience similar as titles like "Dead By Daylight" but with our own spin.

The killer is a Blood Harvester, that must bleed the survivors out to complete the Ritual for their master, while survivors have to escape the killer's grasp and find an exit to the twisted realm.

  • Killer has to damage survivors to gain blood and pour it into blood fountains. The killer gains powers as more blood is stored, up to the end of The Ritual where the killer can finish off survivors.
  • Survivors can be downed and sent to the Other Dimension. This is a puzzle-like maze where survivors have to exit in order to return to the main map. In there, they are unable to complete objectives until they can be returned.
  • Survivors have to escape chases, avoid being drained, sabotage killer resources to delay the Ritual and help each other to escape the realm, or from the Other dimension.

This prototype focuses on the Core Mechanics and Game Feel, as a 'vertical slice' of the killer's experience. This means the prototype will lack some aspects, like the multiplayer, so the final experience of this prototype is a player (killer) vs AI experience.

Hope you like it!!
